name: The Ballad of the Brave Little Drummer
name_original: The Ballad of the Brave Little Drummer
description:
The Ballad of the Brave Little Drummer

One faithful morning our brave hero is woken up by the terrible news that his band members are captures by the castle guards and put in prison! They will be executed at sundown. It is up to the brave little drummer to rescue them and escape. 

Balkan 24h Game Jam Women's Edition submission

Team:

 Nikoleta Zhecheva - 3D Art

Laura Herceg - Music

Tsanislav Filipov - Programming
